channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15407] Add SASL support for fan out OutputStream
item.description:
Otherwise we can not use it in secure environment.

Should be a netty handler, but see

https://github.com/netty/netty/issues/1966

I do not think it will be available in the near future, so we need to do it by ourselves.
item.summary: Add SASL support for fan out OutputStream

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
An initial patch that only works with hadoop-2.7.x.

Cipher is not supported yet.

This message was automatically generated.

We are still using hadoop 2.4 so I can only test the encrypted data transfer.
Insert 100000 rows using PE tool. And I found this in regionserver's log
